Update

Apr 20, 2020

I uploaded a preprint to the arXiv. It contains the details of many of the blog posts I’ve made so far. I hope it’s interesting to at least some people :)

I also posted an update to my paper on the Witten genus; this update’s been around on my website for a while, and I only just remembered that it was not also updated on the arXiv. Also, Peter and I will soon post an update to our paper, because of some errors with regards to connectivity/connectedness that were pointed out to us by Andre Joyal.
